member.name: T:FeserWard.Controls.FilePathSearchProvider
member.summary: A default data provider for the . This data provider searches the local filesystem for Files or Directories or both whose fully-qualified path matches the partial path entered by the user.

member.summary: Defines the interface contract between an and its .

member.name: M:FeserWard.Controls.IIntelliboxResultsProvider.DoSearch(System.String,System.Int32,System.Object)
member.summary: Tell the to search for the .
member.param: The text in the search box at the time the search was requested.
The maximum number of search results the wants returned.
This is the value of the Tag property of the control at the time the search was started. Use the Tag property to pass any custom data to your .

member.param: Whether this provider should search for Directories, Files, or both.

member.name: M:FeserWard.Controls.FilePathSearchProvider.DoSearch(System.String,System.Int32,System.Object)
member.summary: Searches for Files and/or Directories on the local filesystem whose fully-qualified path matched the . Directories are always returned before files.
member.param: The search path. The function will return all the files and/or directories under this path.
The maximum number of results to return. The function will return all results when this is 0 (zero).
member.returns: A list of Files or Directories whose fully-qualified path starts with the .

member.name: P:FeserWard.Controls.FilePathSearchProvider.IncludeInSearch
member.summary: Whether this should search for Directories, Files, or both.

member.summary: Enumeration of the search options for a

member.name: F:FeserWard.Controls.FilePathSearchProvider.PathSearchIncludes.FilesAndDirectories
member.summary: Search for matching Files and for matching Directories.

member.name: F:FeserWard.Controls.FilePathSearchProvider.PathSearchIncludes.FilesOnly
member.summary: Search for matching Files, but not for matching Directories.

member.name: F:FeserWard.Controls.FilePathSearchProvider.PathSearchIncludes.DirectoriesOnly
member.summary: Search for matching Directories, but not for matching Files.

member.name: T:FeserWard.Controls.WatermarkTextVisibilityConverter

member.name: M:FeserWard.Controls.WatermarkTextVisibilityConverter.Convert(System.Object[],System.Type,System.Object,System.Globalization.CultureInfo)
member.summary: Determines whether to show or hide watermark text based on whether the input control has focus or has a value. The first value passed to this multi-value converter is assumed to be the Text value of the input control, and the second value whether or not the control has focus.
member.param: The of the return value. Should be .
member.returns: if either of the parameters is true, otherwise .

member.name: M:FeserWard.Controls.WatermarkTextVisibilityConverter.ConvertBack(System.Object,System.Type[],System.Object,System.Globalization.CultureInfo)
member.summary: This function is not supported. The is a one-way conversion. Calling this function will throw a .

member.name: T:FeserWard.Controls.Intellibox
member.summary:
An implementation of the MS Access 'Lookup' field for WPF that uses the Provider pattern.
Features
Text shown in the search field can be different from the value selected by the user.
Fully supports syncronous and asyncronous searches.
Displayed columns can be fully customized.
Supports search cancelation.
Supports watermark text that shows when the control doesn't have focus or any content.
Intellibox

Because of a bug in .NET, this method should only ever be called from the dispatcher, and only ever with 'DispatcherPriority.Background'

member.summary: Called whenever (and ONLY whenever) the user has either 1. selected an item from the result set 2. decided not to select an item from the result set 3. cleared the currently selected item

member.summary: InitializeComponent

member.name: E:FeserWard.Controls.Intellibox.SearchBeginning
member.summary: This event is fired immediately before a new search is started. Note that not every event has a matching event.

member.name: E:FeserWard.Controls.Intellibox.SearchCompleted
member.summary: This event is fired once a search has completed and the search results have been processed. Note that not every event has a matching event.

member.name: P:FeserWard.Controls.Intellibox.CancelAllSearches
member.summary: Cancel all pending searches for the provider.

member.name: P:FeserWard.Controls.Intellibox.Columns
member.summary: The columns in the search result set to display. When is set to true, then only the s in this collection will be shown. Setting to true will prevent column headers from being shown.

member.name: P:FeserWard.Controls.Intellibox.DataProvider
member.summary: This is the that the uses to ask for search results. This is a Dependancy Property.

member.name: P:FeserWard.Controls.Intellibox.DisableWhitespaceTrim
member.summary: When True, the text in the search field will NOT be trimmed for whitespace prior to being passed to the .

member.name: P:FeserWard.Controls.Intellibox.DisplayedValueBinding
member.summary: A binding expression that determines which column in the search result set displays its value in the text field. Typically, the value displayed should correspond to the column the searches on. This binding expression can be different from the on in the . If this property is NULL, then an entire row from the search result set displays its value in the text field. This is a Dependancy Property.

member.name: P:FeserWard.Controls.Intellibox.ExplicitlyIncludeColumns
member.summary: When True, only the s in the collection will display in the search results set. When False, all the columns in the search result set will show, but any columns in the collection then override specific columns.

member.name: P:FeserWard.Controls.Intellibox.HideColumnHeaders
member.summary: When True, columns in the search result set will not have headers. This is a Dependancy Property.

member.name: P:FeserWard.Controls.Intellibox.IsSearchInProgress
member.summary: When true, means that the control is in 'Search' mode. i.e. that it is firing searches as the user types and waiting for results.

member.name: P:FeserWard.Controls.Intellibox.IntermediateSelectedValue
member.summary: This is the binding target of the property, so that users of the control can place their own bindings on the property.

member.name: P:FeserWard.Controls.Intellibox.MaxResults
member.summary: Gets or sets the maximum number of results that the asks its for. This is a Dependancy Property.

member.name: P:FeserWard.Controls.Intellibox.MinimumPrefixLength
member.summary: The minimum number of characters to wait for the user to enter before starting the first search. After the first search has been started, the property controls how often additional searches are performed (assumming that additional text has been entered). Minimum value is 1 (one). Defaults to 1 (one);

member.name: P:FeserWard.Controls.Intellibox.MinimumSearchDelay
member.summary: The number of milliseconds the control will wait between searches when the user is rapidly entering text. Minimum is 125 milliseconds. Defaults to 250 milliseconds.

member.name: P:FeserWard.Controls.Intellibox.PagingScrollRows
member.summary: The number of rows to scroll up or down when a user uses the Page Up or Page Down key.

member.name: P:FeserWard.Controls.Intellibox.ResultsList
member.summary: Internal Use Only. Do Not Use. This property exists so that the can run in partial-trust;

member.name: P:FeserWard.Controls.Intellibox.ResultsHeight
member.summary: Gets or sets the suggested height that the search results popup. The default value is 200. This is a Dependancy Property.

member.name: P:FeserWard.Controls.Intellibox.ResultsMaxHeight
member.summary: Gets or sets the maximum height that the search results popup is allowed to have. This is a Dependancy Property.

member.name: P:FeserWard.Controls.Intellibox.ResultsMaxWidth
member.summary: Gets or sets the maximum width that the search results popup is allowed to have. This is a Dependancy Property.

member.name: P:FeserWard.Controls.Intellibox.ResultsMinHeight
member.summary: Gets or sets the minimum height that the search results popup is allowed to have. This is a Dependancy Property.

member.name: P:FeserWard.Controls.Intellibox.ResultsMinWidth
member.summary: Gets or sets the minimum width that the search results popup is allowed to have. This is a Dependancy Property.

member.name: P:FeserWard.Controls.Intellibox.ResultsWidth
member.summary: Gets or sets the suggested width that the search results popup is allowed to have. The default value is 400. This is a Dependancy Property.

member.name: P:FeserWard.Controls.Intellibox.RowColorizer
member.summary: Gets or sets the used to color each row of the search result set. Set to an instance of by default.

member.name: P:FeserWard.Controls.Intellibox.SearchProvider
member.summary: The Search provider that will actually perform the search

member.name: P:FeserWard.Controls.Intellibox.SearchTimer
member.summary: Using a dispatcher timer so that the 'Tick' event gets posted on the UI thread and we don't have to worry about exceptions throwing when accessing UI controls.

member.name: P:FeserWard.Controls.Intellibox.SelectAllOnFocus
member.summary: When true, all of the text in the field will be selected when the control gets focus.

member.name: P:FeserWard.Controls.Intellibox.SelectedItem
member.summary: The data row from the search result set that the user has most recently selected and confirmed. This is a Dependancy Property.

member.name: P:FeserWard.Controls.Intellibox.SelectedValue
member.summary: A value out of the . The exact value depends on the property. This is a Dependancy Property.

member.name: P:FeserWard.Controls.Intellibox.SelectedValueBinding
member.summary: A binding expression that determines what will be chosen out of the . If this property is NULL, then the entire is chosen as the . This property exists so that the can differ from the value displayed in the text field. This is a Dependancy Property.

member.name: P:FeserWard.Controls.Intellibox.AutoSelectSingleResult
member.summary: When query results that have only a single result will will be automatically selected.

member.name: P:FeserWard.Controls.Intellibox.TimeBeforeWaitNotification
member.summary: The amount of time (in milliseconds) that the control will wait for results to come back before showing the user a "Waiting for results" message. Minimum: 0ms, Default: 125ms

member.summary: Sets the background of the when it is displayed.

member.summary: Sets the of the when it is displayed.

member.summary: Sets the foreground of the when it is displayed. Default is .

member.summary: Sets the text that is displayed when the doesn't have focus or any entered content.

member.name: T:FeserWard.Controls.IntelliboxRowColorizer
member.summary: Provides an abstract implementation of an that converts a ListBoxItem into a Brush based on the index of the ListBoxItem in its parent collection.

member.name: M:FeserWard.Controls.IntelliboxRowColorizer.GetBrushes
member.summary: Must be overridden by derived classes to return the brushes that the derived class wants to use when converting from a ListBoxItem to a System.Windows.Media.Brush
member.returns: The System.Windows.Media.Brushes that should be used when converting a ListBoxItem to a Brush.

member.name: M:FeserWard.Controls.IntelliboxRowColorizer.Convert(System.Object,System.Type,System.Object,System.Globalization.CultureInfo)
member.summary: Converts a ListBoxItem to the System.Windows.Media.Brush based upon its ordinal position within its containing ListBox.
member.param: A ListBoxItem or a derived class.
NOT USED. The converter parameter to use.
NOT USED. The culture to use in the converter.
member.returns: The brush to use for the background of the ListBoxItem.

member.name: M:FeserWard.Controls.IntelliboxRowColorizer.ConvertBack(System.Object,System.Type,System.Object,System.Globalization.CultureInfo)
member.summary: Throws an when called, since it is impossible to reverse the conversion done by the Convert() method.

member.name: T:FeserWard.Controls.IntelliboxAlternateRowColorizer
member.summary: Provides a simple way to color the even rows of a ListBox with one color and the odd rows with another.

member.summary: Returns the brushes that this object wants to use to colorize the background of each row in a ListBox control.
member.returns: An array that contains the values of the and at the time of the call.

member.name: P:FeserWard.Controls.IntelliboxAlternateRowColorizer.OddRowBrush

member.name: T:FeserWard.Controls.IntelliboxColumn
member.summary: Represents a column that displays data from an result set.

member.name: P:FeserWard.Controls.IntelliboxColumn.ForProperty
member.summary: Associates this column with a property on a result set data row. The data row property name that matches this string will be hidden or positioned based on the and values.

member.name: P:FeserWard.Controls.IntelliboxColumn.Hide
member.summary: When True, this column will not be shown in the result set. This property is useful if you only want to hide a few columns of the result set; otherwise you're probably better off just listing all the columns explicitly.

member.name: P:FeserWard.Controls.IntelliboxColumn.Position
member.summary: When set, controls the left-to-right position of this column in the result set. Lower numbers sort farther to the left. NULL values sort to the right.

member.name: T:FeserWard.Controls.IntelliboxColumnCollection
member.summary: Represents an observable collection of s. This class exists becuase XAML pre-2009 spec doesn't support the instantiation of generic types.
